reviewText:
I thought I'd give this a try, seeing how it's only $2. Unfortunately you get what you pay for and this game was sadly not particularly good.

The gameplay is very simple, as demonstrated in the trailer on Steam. But that's also all there's to it: a very light shoot 'em up.

The game is incredibly repetitive. Monsters come at you from the exact same angles every few seconds, making the game more of a pattern recognition exercise than anything. You have a basic attack that you can pretty much spam continuously and a whirlwind attack that needs to be charged but only kills certain enemies. The lack of a health bar, score meter or progress meter to the next boss is very annoying.

Graphically there's really nothing to it. Playing it full screen is not recommended, as it makes all the ugly stand out.

There's also not much sound. Aside from the looping organ music, the sound assets seem limited to a whopping 3 sound bites.

reviewText: It's a pretty fun no frills game. It reminds me of the old 1942 airplane game I played as a kid but in a halloween theme. It's kinda hard, still havent managed to kill the second boss, headless horseman.  Easy game to jump in and out of if you just have a few miniutes to kill.

reviewText: If you enjoy the arcade-style games of a foregone age, this a game for you. Being that the game is inexpensive, simple, and easy to learn. Complete with a scoreboard, Flight of the Paladin is a solid time sink that you can improve at your own pace and enjoy.

reviewText: I've been looking for something simple with a bit of flare added to it, it's a fun game that isn't complicated but lets you focus on something that takes a bit of brainwork. Nice chill game.\n\n8/10

reviewText: This game is worth the price; especially if you're paying with a coupon.  If you're looking for depth, look elsewhere.  But if you're down for a late 80s style Arcade shooter, this is the one.

reviewText: There are many things to say about life. Sometimes you get punched straight in the face by ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥s and are expected to stand right back up and keep moving. Other times you are extorted by greedy people that lack foresight beyond their own needs. But not here. This game does not knock you down, it does not steal from you! This game truly is a gem amongst gems, a beautiful woman lying by a cool stream, a freshly cleaned fedora sitting atop a plate of hotpockets. 11/10 made me experience feelings beyond comprehension.
